__TOC__

* Face to face meet up on Thursday 4th of March with <nowiki>[[http://www.linux.ie/|ILUG]]</nowiki> in the <nowiki>[[http://www.thelongstone.com|Longstone]]</nowiki>. 

* Regular <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/IRCMeetings/2010-03-10|Monthly IRC Meeting]]</nowiki> was held at 8pm Irish time on Wednesday 10th March 2010.

* For <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuGlobalJam| Global Jam]]</nowiki> we decided to change it up a little and call it <nowiki>[[http://openevents.ie/doku.php?id=openjam|Open Jam]]</nowiki>. So on Saturday 27th of March , we invited all the <nowiki>[[http://openevents.ie/doku.php?id=openjam-signup|open source group's]]</nowiki> in Dublin to come along for a day of open source. Some <nowiki>[[http://pix.ie/czajkowski/album/372938|photo's]]</nowiki> and a <nowiki>[[http://desinterets.wordpress.com/2010/03/28/ubuntu-globaljam/|write up]]</nowiki>.

* We had a lively <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Hour| Ubuntu Hour]]</nowiki> on the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-ie.org/node/92 | 31st of March]]</nowiki> at 6pm  at the <nowiki>[[http://www.trinitycapitalhotel.com/ | Trinity Capital Hotel bar]]</nowiki>. Showing off the Ubuntu LoCo Directory and discussing it's uses and seeing how best we can use it for our team.

* Plans are well under way for our next big event next month. <nowiki>[[http://www.ossbarcamp.com/| OSSBarcamp]]</nowiki> on the 17th of April.
